document_data.mainbody:
Sorn was a fighter in Thay and an agent of the zulkir Lauzoril in 1357 DR.
In 1357 DR, under Lauzorils orders, Sorn posed as a trader and went to participate in the tournament held in Mourktar in Threskel to choose a new king. He managed to finish among the tournaments finalists. His orders were to win or kill the winner.
